message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer but that's a bit too high for me. Would you consider $65?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm still confident in the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $75. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's still a fantastic deal!
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice.  How about $70?  That's a fair price.

I'm getting close to your target, Bob! I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $70. I'll offer it to you for $72. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll find it's still a great deal!
